title: ICS import stays on 0% progress, but invite imports successfully
content:
Ever since Nebula released, importing ICS files into the Thunderbird calendar (connected to my Google account) never moves from 0% progress, but the invite imports successfully. After I close the Import tab the invite appears in the calendar where it's supposed to be. I've left it for many minutes and progress stays at 0%. Anyone else seeing this happen?

Running Thunderbird 128.4.2esr (64-bit) on Windows 11 23H2.
creator: eliu

title: Message Filters - Body Contains - Not Working - Thunderbird 128.4.2esr (64-bit)
content: I am trying to apply this filter but unsucssesfylly. I am looking for a exact number that appears in the message, to move the e-mail to a specific folder. I've already checked usind CTRL+F and it appears. Any suggestion? Here are some pictures.
creator: gustavonedel

title: Thunderbird: how to change -- printed emails show subject line at top of page, centered
content:
when i print emails the email content & subject/to-from/date header info is fine. But TBird also prints the subject at the top of page in smaller print and wrong font.

I like the easy to find subject, but how can i change the font & size to something i, not the software, prefer? do i need to do this in FFox?

Using win10 home, TBird 115.12.2 (64-bit). [not using latest version, because terrified i'll have to spend another 4-6 hours configuring like i had to for 115*]

thx for any illumination. ***please keep in mind i am NOT an IT professional & actually an IT klutz***
creator: pat.g888
